stories.title: Trump says UK’s Starmer making ‘a big mistake’ with Chagos Islands deal
stories.summary: The US president warned the military base on Diego Garcia may be needed to respond to possible attack from Iran.

stories.title: Meta’s Zuckerberg pushes back on social media youth addiction claims
stories.summary: In a Los Angeles court, the Meta CEO was questioned about whether Instagram’s design contributed to addictive behavior.

stories.title: US is withdrawing all 1,000 troops from Syria: WSJ report
stories.summary: The report says US officials expect troops to withdraw from remaining positions within two months.

prompt: Editorial news illustration divided into exactly 3 equal vertical panels side by side. Panel 1: Trump says UKs Starmer making a big mistake with Chagos Islands deal. Panel 2: Metas Zuckerberg pushes back on social media youth addiction claims. Panel 3: US is withdrawing all 1,000 troops from Syria WSJ report. Style: bold, cinematic, modern editorial magazine cover art, rich colors, dramatic lighting, clean composition, professional photojournalism aesthetic. Each panel has a distinct scene. No text, no words, no letters, no captions, no overlays of any kind.
